text:
Hello everyone! 
I'm so happy to connect with great minds here.

 I'm a Content marketing consultant for B2B and SaaS brands! 
I've been a Content writer for over 10 years, and I'm enjoying my transition to the marketing world. :star-struck: 

I look forward to making new friends, learning new things and most importantly,  making a valuable contribution to this network. Thanks!

text:
Hello everyone my name is Heritage
I am a Graphic/Brand designer, storyteller and content writer.

I am super stoked about building bridges between companies and their target markets through creative design and content. 
 
I am a believer in the fact that as a brand/company, it goes beyond saying what your vision is about,
when the rubber hits the road you have to show it. A picture is worth a thousand words they say,
creatively designed and intuitive content and communications is worth way more.

Having sufficient agency experience, I have worked with a number of brands; designing brand
collaterals, communications, and adverts, with the aim of maintaining their uniqueness across
several mediums, whilst getting their message across.
 
I am super super glad to be here and happy to be a part of this community. Thanks :rocket::rocket:

text:
Hi lovely humans, :wave::skin-tone-5: I've been writing for some 5 years now, with a background in research, fashion, creative writing, and health (literally worked as a pharmacist for a few years). But I recently decided on a path in SEO content writing. 

I’m currently the content specialist at The Naira Haus where I both develop content strategies and tell the stories of local brands in Nigeria. 

When I’m not trying to figure out content insights, you’ll likely find me writing short stories, drinking camomile tea, or relearning how to draw(:slightly_smiling_face:).

And I’m here because I’m still early in my path as an SEO content writer. So, I’ll love to learn from the experts here, while I share knowledge from my experience as a writer and creative. 

Can't wait to learn and share and grow with you all!
